00012 #define _XVTRACKER_H_

00014 #define DEFAULT_ITERATIONS 1
00015 
00016 #include <XVInteractive.h>
00017 #include <XVDrawable.h>
00018 #include <XVException.h>
00019 #include <XVFeature.h>
00020 
00037 template <class SRCTYPE, class FEATURETYPE>
00038 class XVTracker {
00039 
00040   typedef typename FEATURETYPE::STATE STATE;
00041 
00042  protected:
00043 
00044   SRCTYPE     & source;
00045   FEATURETYPE & feature;
00046   
00047   int stepsPerFrame;
00048   int frameNum;
00049 
00050  public:
00051 
00052   XVTracker(SRCTYPE & s, FEATURETYPE & f, int pf = DEFAULT_ITERATIONS) 
00053     : source(s), feature(f), stepsPerFrame(pf), frameNum(0) {};
00054   
00055   virtual STATE init(STATE & initState) { feature.initState(initState); return feature.getState(); }
00056   virtual void track() throw (XVTrackerException);
00057   virtual STATE nextState() throw (XVTrackerException);
00058 };
00059 
00079 template <class SRCTYPE, class WINTYPE, class FEATURETYPE>
00080 class XVDisplayTracker : public XVTracker<SRCTYPE, FEATURETYPE> {
00081  protected:
00082   using XVTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::source ;
00083   using XVTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::feature ;
00084   using XVTracker<SRCTYPE,FEATURETYPE>::stepsPerFrame ;
00085 
00086  protected:
00087 
00088   WINTYPE & window;
00089 
00090  public:
00091 
00092   XVDisplayTracker(SRCTYPE & s, WINTYPE & w, FEATURETYPE & f, int pf = DEFAULT_ITERATIONS) 
00093     : XVTracker<SRCTYPE, FEATURETYPE>(s, f, pf), window(w) {}
00094 
00095   virtual typename FEATURETYPE::STATE init();
00096   virtual void track() throw (XVTrackerException);
00097   virtual typename FEATURETYPE::STATE nextState() throw (XVTrackerException);
00098 };
